summary: I BOUGHT A 2009 CHEVY COBALT SS USED WITH 9000 MILES ON IT.  FROM THE DAY I BOUGHT IT I CONSISTENTLY HEARD REAR BRAKE NOISE WHENEVER I STOPPED THE CAR.  THERE IS EXCESSIVE PAD WEAR ON THE REAR BRAKES AT 11000 MILES NOW.  WAY TOO MUCH WEAR THAN NORMAL.  DEEP SCORING IN THE ROTORS. TOOK THE CAR TO THE DEALERSHIP I PURCHASED IT FROM AND THEY RESURFACED THE ROTORS  BUT THE PROBLEM WAS STILL THERE AFTER I DROVE THE CAR HOME FROM THE SHOP.  SO FAR NOTHING HAS BEEN DONE TO CORRECT THIS PROBLEM BY THE DEALERSHIP OF CHEVY. *TR
